name: .JNLP File Extension
summary: Learn about .JNLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open and edit a JNLP file in any text or source code editor, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Code or GitHub Atom. Source code editors contain syntax highlighting tools that make reading and editing JNLP files easier.
If you want to run the Java program a JNLP file points to, you can do so using Karakun OpenWebStart and Java.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
